biotools.summary: Takes a PDB ID, a structure coordinate file or a list of phi and psi angles as input and searches for matches to a specified structural fragment. Users can tailor the search based on sequence similarity and vary the dataset searched against.

bioschemas.name: FF - Fragment Finder
bioschemas.summary: Takes a PDB ID, a structure coordinate file or a list of phi and psi angles as input and searches for matches to a specified structural fragment. Users can tailor the search based on sequence similarity and vary the dataset searched against.
